mapper.select: SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.BSCON_CD, XC.BSCONHAN_NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST AA WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = XA.BRAN_CD AND AA.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } ) AS DUPCNT, ( CASE WHEN (GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(XA.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) > 0) THEN XB.MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC( XB.MONPRNCFEE2 * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = XB.BSTYP_CD ) ) ELSE XB.MONPRNCFEE END ) + NVL( ( SELECT NVL(ADDT_AMT + EADDT_AMT, 0) FROM GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_OCR_MM WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND DEMD_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } AND START_YRMN = ( SELECT MIN(START_YRMN) FROM GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_OCR_MM WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND DEMD_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } ) ), 0 ) AS MONPRNCFEE, GIBU.FT_SPLIT( GIBU.FT_GET_DEMD_MONPRNCFEE(XA.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }), ',', 0 ) AS MONPRNCFEE2, SUBSTR(# { apptnYrmn }, 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(# { apptnYrmn }, 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, ( SELECT UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_ONOFF_DATA_GBN(UPSO_CD) LIKE '%?????メ?%' THEN MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC(MONPRNCFEE * 0.7, -1) ELSE MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_ONOFF_DATA_GBN(UPSO_CD) LIKE '%?????メ?%' THEN MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC(MONPRNCFEE2 * 0.7, -1) ELSE MONPRNCFEE2 END ) AS MONPRNCFEE2, BSTYP_CD FROM ( SELECT ZA.UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 0 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) < 10 THEN 0 WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 10 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) <= 20 THEN TRUNC(ZB.MONPRNCFEE * 0.5, -1) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 0 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) < 10 THEN 0 WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 10 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) <= 20 THEN TRUNC(ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 * 0.5, -1) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 END ) AS MONPRNCFEE2, ZB.BSTYP_CD FROM ( SELECT A.UPSO_CD, MAX(A.JOIN_SEQ) JOIN_SEQ FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO A WHERE A.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD ) ZA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO ZB, GIBU.TBRA_BSTYPGRAD ZC WHERE ZB.JOIN_SEQ = ZA.JOIN_SEQ AND ZB.UPSO_CD = ZA.UPSO_CD AND ZC.BSTYP_CD = ZB.BSTYP_CD AND ZC.GRAD_GBN = ZB.UPSO_GRAD ) ) XB, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XC WHERE XA.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND XB.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XC.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XA.UPSO_CD NOT IN ( SELECT AA.UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO AA, ( SELECT MAX(A.AUTO_NUM) AS AUTO_NUM, A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE A.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD AND B.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN ) BB WHERE BB.TERM_YN = 'N' AND BB.AUTO_NUM = AA.AUTO_NUM AND BB.UPSO_CD = AA.UPSO_CD ) UNION ALL SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.BSCON_CD, XC.BSCONHAN_NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST AA WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = XA.BRAN_CD AND AA.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } ) AS DUPCNT, ( CASE WHEN (GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(XA.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) > 0) THEN TRUNC( XB.MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC( XB.MONPRNCFEE2 * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = XB.BSTYP_CD ) ) - TRUNC( ( XB.MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC( XB.MONPRNCFEE2 * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = XB.BSTYP_CD ) ) ) * 0.01, -1 ) ) ELSE ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_CONTRINFO WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) > 0 THEN TRUNC(XB.MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC(XB.MONPRNCFEE * 0.01, -1)) ELSE TRUNC(XB.MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC(XB.MONPRNCFEE * 0.01, -1), -1) END ) END ) + NVL( ( SELECT NVL(ADDT_AMT + EADDT_AMT, 0) FROM GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_AUTO_MM WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND DEMD_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } AND START_YRMN = ( SELECT MIN(START_YRMN) FROM GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_AUTO_MM WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND DEMD_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } ) ), 0 ) AS MONPRNCFEE, GIBU.FT_SPLIT( GIBU.FT_GET_DEMD_MONPRNCFEE(XA.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }), ',', 0 ) AS MONPRNCFEE2, SUBSTR(# { apptnYrmn }, 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(# { apptnYrmn }, 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, ( SELECT UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_ONOFF_DATA_GBN(UPSO_CD) LIKE '%?????メ?%' THEN MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC(MONPRNCFEE * 0.7, -1) ELSE MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_ONOFF_DATA_GBN(UPSO_CD) LIKE '%?????メ?%' THEN MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC(MONPRNCFEE2 * 0.7, -1) ELSE MONPRNCFEE2 END ) AS MONPRNCFEE2, BSTYP_CD FROM ( SELECT ZA.UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 0 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) < 10 THEN 0 WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 10 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) <= 20 THEN TRUNC(ZB.MONPRNCFEE * 0.5, -1) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE, ( CASE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 0 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) < 10 THEN 0 WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) >= 10 AND GIBU.FT_GET_CLSED_DAYS(ZB.UPSO_CD, # { apptnYrmn }) <= 20 THEN TRUNC(ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 * 0.5, -1) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 END ) AS MONPRNCFEE2, ZB.BSTYP_CD FROM ( SELECT A.UPSO_CD, MAX(A.JOIN_SEQ) JOIN_SEQ FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO A WHERE A.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD ) ZA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO ZB, GIBU.TBRA_BSTYPGRAD ZC WHERE ZB.JOIN_SEQ = ZA.JOIN_SEQ AND ZB.UPSO_CD = ZA.UPSO_CD AND ZC.BSTYP_CD = ZB.BSTYP_CD AND ZC.GRAD_GBN = ZB.UPSO_GRAD ) ) XB, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XC, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO XE WHERE XA.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND XA.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' AND XE.TERM_YN = 'N' AND XB.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XC.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XE.UPSO_CD IN ( SELECT AA.UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO AA, ( SELECT MAX(A.AUTO_NUM) AS AUTO_NUM, A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE B.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD AND B.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN ) BB WHERE BB.TERM_YN = 'N' AND BB.AUTO_NUM = AA.AUTO_NUM AND BB.UPSO_CD = AA.UPSO_CD ) AND XE.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD
mapper.delete: Delete from GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL where APPRV_NUM = # { apprvNum }
mapper.update: Update GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL set MODPRES_ID = # { modpresId }, ISS_COMPL_YN = # { issComplYn }, ISS_AMT = # { issAmt }, BILL_GBN = # { billGbn }, ISS_BRE = # { issBre }, ISS_DAY = # { issDay }, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE, REMAK = # { remak } where DEMD_NUM = # { demdNum } and APPRV_NUM = # { apprvNum }
mapper.select: SELECT # { apptnYrmn } || LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DEMD_NUM, 7))) + 1, 0), 4, '0' ) AS NEW_DEMD_NUM FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST WHERE APPTN_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn }
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL WHERE DEMD_NUM = # { demdNum }
mapper.insert: Insert into GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST ( DEMD_NUM, INS_DATE, INSPRES_ID, APPTN_YRMN, UPSO_CD, APPTN_GBN, BRAN_CD, BSCON_CD ) values ( # { demdNum }, SYSDATE, # { inspresId }, # { apptnYrmn }, # { upsoCd }, # { apptnGbn }, # { branCd }, # { bsconCd } )

INSERT INTO GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL ( DEMD_NUM, APPRV_NUM, BILL_KND, BILL_GBN, SUPPBSCON_CD, ISS_BRE, ISS_AMT, ISS_DAY, REMAK, ISS_COMPL_YN, INSPRES_ID, INS_DATE ) SELECT DEMD_NUM, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || TRIM( TO_CHAR( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(APPRV_NUM, 9), 'XXX')), 0) + RN, '0XX' ) ) AS APPRV_NUM FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL WHERE APPRV_NUM LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(APPRV_NUM, 9), 'XXX') > 0 ) AS APPRV_NUM, BILL_KND, BILL_GBN, SUPPBSCON_CD, ISS_BRE, ISS_AMT, ISS_DAY, REMAK, ISS_COMPL_YN, INSPRES_ID, SYSDATE FROM ( SELECT # { demdNum } AS DEMD_NUM, ROWNUM AS RN, BILL_KND, # { billGbn } AS BILL_GBN, SUPPBSCON_CD, # { issBre } AS ISS_BRE, TO_NUMBER(ISS_AMT) AS ISS_AMT, # { issDay } AS ISS_DAY, # { remak } AS REMAK, # { issComplYn } AS ISS_COMPL_YN, # { inspresId } AS INSPRES_ID FROM ( SELECT 'KOMCA' AS SUPPBSCON_CD, TO_NUMBER(# { komcaAmt }) AS ISS_AMT, 1 AS R_NUM, '4' AS BILL_KND FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'T0000001' AS SUPPBSCON_CD, FLOOR( # { monprncfee2 } * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = GIBU.FT_GET_BSTYP_INFO(# { upsoCd }) AND APPL_DAY < # { issDay } ) ) AS ISS_AMT, 2 AS R_NUM, '5' AS BILL_KND FROM DUAL WHERE GIBU.FT_GET_BSTYP_INFO(# { upsoCd }) IN ('k', 'l', 'o') UNION ALL SELECT BSCON_CD, ( CASE WHEN BSCON_CD = 'T0000001' THEN FLOOR( # { monprncfee2 } * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = GIBU.FT_GET_BSTYP_INFO(# { upsoCd }) AND APPL_DAY < # { issDay } ) ) ELSE DEMD_AMT END ) AS ISS_AMT, ROWNUM + 1 AS R_NUM, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT ATAX_YN FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_CONTRINFO WHERE UPSO_CD = A.UPSO_CD AND BSCON_CD = A.BSCON_CD AND BSCON_UPSO_CD = A.BSCON_UPSO_CD AND SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_CONTRINFO WHERE UPSO_CD = A.UPSO_CD AND BSCON_CD = A.BSCON_CD AND BSCON_UPSO_CD = A.BSCON_UPSO_CD ) ) = 'Y' THEN '6' ELSE '5' END ) AS BILL_KND FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_DEMD_UPLOAD A WHERE DEMD_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } AND UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } ) A )
mapper.delete: Delete from GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST where DEMD_NUM = # { demdNum }
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS DUPCNT, NVL( MAX( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST AA, GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL BB WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } AND AA.DEMD_NUM = BB.DEMD_NUM AND BB.ISS_COMPL_YN = '2' AND AA.APPTN_GBN = '1' ) ), 0 ) AS ISS_COMPL_YN_CNT FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST A WHERE BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND APPTN_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } AND APPTN_GBN = '1'

SELECT A.DEMD_NUM, A.UPSO_CD, B.APPRV_NUM, C.UPSO_NM, A.BSCON_CD, D.BSCONHAN_NM, A.BRAN_CD, E.DEPT_NM AS BRAN_NM, A.APPTN_YRMN, B.ISS_BRE, B.ISS_AMT AS KOMCA_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(ISS_AMT) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL WHERE DEMD_NUM = A.DEMD_NUM ) AS ISS_AMT, B.BILL_GBN, B.REMAK, B.ISS_DAY, DECODE( ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FIDU.BILL_TRANS WHERE BILLSEQ = B.BILL_NUM ), 0, 1, 1, 2 ) AS ISS_COMPL_YN, NVL(B.ISS_COMPL_YN, 0) AS ISSADD_YN, B.BILL_NUM, DECODE(A.APPTN_GBN, '1', '???', '2', '????') APPTN_GBN, B.BILL_KND, B.SUPPBSCON_CD, ( CASE WHEN B.SUPPBSCON_CD = 'KOMCA' THEN '(??)???????????????' ELSE ( SELECT HANMB_NM FROM FIDU.TMEM_MB WHERE MB_CD = B.SUPPBSCON_CD ) END ) AS SUPPBSCON_NM, FIDU.GET_STAFF_NM(C.STAFF_CD) AS STAFF_NM FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MST A, GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_DTL B, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO C, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON D, INSA.TCPM_DEPT E WHERE A.BRAN_CD = DECODE( # { branCd }, NULL, A.BRAN_CD, 'AL', A.BRAN_CD, # { branCd } ) AND A.DEMD_NUM = B.DEMD_NUM AND B.BILL_KND IN ('4', '5', '6') AND A.APPTN_YRMN = # { apptnYrmn } AND C.BRAN_CD = A.BRAN_CD AND C.UPSO_CD = A.UPSO_CD AND D.BSCON_CD = A.BSCON_CD AND E.GIBU = A.BRAN_CD ORDER BY C.BRAN_CD, A.INS_DATE, A.BSCON_CD, B.SUPPBSCON_CD

SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.UPSO_NM, XA.BSCON_CD, XB.BSCONHAN_NM, XA.BRAN_CD, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE, ( CASE WHEN ( GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(XA.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6)) = 0 ) AND ( ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_CONTRINFO WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD ) > 0 ) THEN XD.MONPRNCFEE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(XA.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6)) > 0 THEN XD.MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC( XD.MONPRNCFEE * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = XD.BSTYP_CD ) ) ELSE XD.TOT_DEMD_AMT END ) AS ISS_AMT, 2 AS BILL_GBN, 0 AS ISS_COMPL_YN, 'I' AS CRUD, '' AS REMAK, '0' AS ISSADD_YN, # { issDay } AS ISS_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XB, GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_OCR XD WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' AND XB.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XD.DEMD_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6) AND XD.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XD.DEMD_GBN = '32' AND XD.TOT_DEMD_AMT > 0 UNION ALL SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.UPSO_NM, XA.BSCON_CD, XB.BSCONHAN_NM, XA.BRAN_CD, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE, XF.MONPRNCFEE AS ISS_AMT, 2 AS BILL_GBN, 0 AS ISS_COMPL_YN, 'I' AS CRUD, '' AS REMAK, '0' AS ISSADD_YN, # { issDay } AS ISS_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XB, ( SELECT ZA.UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN ( GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(ZB.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6)) > 0 ) THEN ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC( ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = ZB.BSTYP_CD ) ) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE FROM ( SELECT A.UPSO_CD, MAX(A.JOIN_SEQ) JOIN_SEQ FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE B.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD ) ZA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO ZB, GIBU.TBRA_BSTYPGRAD ZC WHERE ZB.JOIN_SEQ = ZA.JOIN_SEQ AND ZB.UPSO_CD = ZA.UPSO_CD AND ZC.BSTYP_CD(+) = ZB.BSTYP_CD AND ZC.GRAD_GBN(+) = ZB.UPSO_GRAD ) XF WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' AND XB.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XF.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XA.UPSO_CD NOT IN ( SELECT UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_OCR WHERE DEMD_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6) AND BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND DEMD_GBN = '32' AND TOT_DEMD_AMT > 0 ) AND XA.UPSO_CD NOT IN ( SELECT AA.UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO AA, ( SELECT MAX(A.AUTO_NUM) AUTO_NUM, A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE B.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD AND B.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN ) BB WHERE BB.TERM_YN = 'N' AND BB.AUTO_NUM = AA.AUTO_NUM AND BB.UPSO_CD = AA.UPSO_CD ) UNION ALL SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.UPSO_NM, XA.BSCON_CD, XB.BSCONHAN_NM, XA.BRAN_CD, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE, XE.TOT_DEMD_AMT AS ISS_AMT, 2 AS BILL_GBN, 0 AS ISS_COMPL_YN, 'I' AS CRUD, '' AS REMAK, '0' AS ISSADD_YN, # { issDay } AS ISS_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XB, GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_AUTO XE WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' AND XB.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XE.DEMD_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6) AND XE.DEMD_GBN = '31' AND XE.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XE.TOT_DEMD_AMT > 0 UNION ALL SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.UPSO_NM, XA.BSCON_CD, XB.BSCONHAN_NM, XA.BRAN_CD, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE, TRUNC(XF.MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC(XF.MONPRNCFEE * 0.01, -1), -1) AS ISS_AMT, 2 AS BILL_GBN, 0 AS ISS_COMPL_YN, 'I' AS CRUD, '' AS REMAK, '0' AS ISSADD_YN, # { issDay } AS ISS_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XB, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO XE, ( SELECT ZA.UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN ( GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(ZB.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6)) > 0 ) THEN ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC( ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = ZB.BSTYP_CD ) ) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE FROM ( SELECT A.UPSO_CD, MAX(A.JOIN_SEQ) JOIN_SEQ FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE B.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD ) ZA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO ZB, GIBU.TBRA_BSTYPGRAD ZC WHERE ZB.JOIN_SEQ = ZA.JOIN_SEQ AND ZB.UPSO_CD = ZA.UPSO_CD AND ZC.BSTYP_CD(+) = ZB.BSTYP_CD AND ZC.GRAD_GBN(+) = ZB.UPSO_GRAD ) XF WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' AND XB.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XE.TERM_YN = 'N' AND XA.UPSO_CD NOT IN ( SELECT UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_AUTO WHERE DEMD_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6) AND DEMD_GBN = '31' AND TOT_DEMD_AMT > 0 ) AND XE.UPSO_CD IN ( SELECT AA.UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO AA, ( SELECT MAX(A.AUTO_NUM) AUTO_NUM, A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE B.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD AND B.BILL_ISS_YN = '1' GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD, A.TERM_YN ) BB WHERE BB.TERM_YN = 'N' AND BB.AUTO_NUM = AA.AUTO_NUM AND BB.UPSO_CD = AA.UPSO_CD ) AND XF.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XE.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD ORDER BY BSCON_CD, UPSO_CD

SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.BSCON_CD, XB.BSCONHAN_NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MNG AA WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = XA.BRAN_CD AND AA.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6) ) AS DUPCNT, ( CASE WHEN ( GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(XA.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6)) = 0 ) AND ( ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_CONTRINFO WHERE UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD ) > 0 ) THEN XD.MONPRNCFEE WHEN GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(XA.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6)) > 0 THEN XD.MONPRNCFEE - TRUNC( XD.MONPRNCFEE * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = XD.BSTYP_CD ) ) ELSE XD.TOT_DEMD_AMT END ) AS MONPRNCFEE, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XB, GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_OCR XD WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND XB.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XD.DEMD_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6) AND XD.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XD.DEMD_GBN = '32' AND XD.TOT_DEMD_AMT > 0 UNION ALL SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.BSCON_CD, XB.BSCONHAN_NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MNG AA WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = XA.BRAN_CD AND AA.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6) ) AS DUPCNT, XE.TOT_DEMD_AMT AS MONPRNCFEE, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XB, GIBU.TBRA_DEMD_AUTO XE WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND XB.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD AND XE.DEMD_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6) AND XE.DEMD_GBN = '31' AND XE.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XE.TOT_DEMD_AMT > 0 ORDER BY BSCON_CD, UPSO_CD

SELECT XA.UPSO_CD, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.BSCON_CD, XC.BSCONHAN_NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MNG AA WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = XA.BRAN_CD AND AA.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6) ) AS DUPCNT, XB.MONPRNCFEE, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS ISS_BRE FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, ( SELECT ZA.UPSO_CD, ( CASE WHEN ( GIBU.FT_GET_IS_BSCON(ZB.UPSO_CD, SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 1, 6)) > 0 ) THEN ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 - TRUNC( ZB.MONPRNCFEE2 * ( SELECT MNG_RATE / 100 FROM GIBU.TBRA_BSCON_MNG_RATE WHERE BSTYP_CD = ZB.BSTYP_CD ) ) ELSE ZB.MONPRNCFEE END ) AS MONPRNCFEE FROM ( SELECT A.UPSO_CD, MAX(A.JOIN_SEQ) JOIN_SEQ FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO A WHERE A.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD ) ZA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO ZB, GIBU.TBRA_BSTYPGRAD ZC WHERE ZB.JOIN_SEQ = ZA.JOIN_SEQ AND ZB.UPSO_CD = ZA.UPSO_CD AND ZC.BSTYP_CD = ZB.BSTYP_CD AND ZC.GRAD_GBN = ZB.UPSO_GRAD ) XB, FIDU.TLEV_BSCON XC WHERE XA.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND XB.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XC.BSCON_CD = XA.BSCON_CD

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DUPCNT, NVL( MAX( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MNG AA WHERE AA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND AA.APPTN_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { apptnYrmn1 }, 1, 6) AND ISS_COMPL_YN = '2' AND APPTN_GBN = '1' ) ), 0 ) AS ISS_COMPL_YN_CNT FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MNG WHERE BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND APPTN_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { apptnYrmn1 }, 1, 6) AND APPTN_GBN = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM FIDU.TTAC_BILL WHERE BILL_NUM = # { billNum }

SELECT XB.MONPRNCFEE, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIBU.TBRA_BILL_ISS_MNG WHERE BSCON_CD = # { bsconCd } AND APPTN_YRMN = SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6) ) DUPCNT, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 0, 4) || '?? ' || SUBSTR(SUBSTR(# { issueYrmn1 }, 0, 6), 5, 2) || '?? ???????' AS CTENT FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XA, ( SELECT ZA.UPSO_CD, DECODE( ZD.UPSO_CD, NULL, ZB.MONPRNCFEE, (ZB.MONPRNCFEE * 0.99) ) MONPRNCFEE, ZC.GRADNM, ZB.BSTYP_CD, ZB.UPSO_GRAD FROM ( SELECT MAX(JOIN_SEQ) JOIN_SEQ, A.UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD AND B.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND A.APPL_DAY <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY A.UPSO_CD ) ZA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSORTAL_INFO ZB, GIBU.TBRA_BSTYPGRAD ZC, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO_AUTO ZD WHERE ZA.UPSO_CD = ZB.UPSO_CD AND ZA.JOIN_SEQ = ZB.JOIN_SEQ AND ZC.GRAD_GBN(+) = ZB.BSTYP_CD AND ZC.BSTYP_CD(+) = 'z' AND ZD.TERM_YN(+) = 'N' AND ZD.UPSO_CD(+) = ZB.UPSO_CD ) XB WHERE XA.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } AND XA.BSCON_CD = # { bsconCd } AND XB.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD
